records.note_contesto: An HP officer deployed by Frontex was found dead in his hotel room, supposedly due to a heart attack.
records.evidenza_testuale: The HP officer who was working as a (deployment co-financed by Frontex) in has been found dead in his hotel room. Supposedly, the officer has died from heart attack.

records.note_contesto: A fight between migrants resulted in at least two injuries, pending confirmation, with no serious injuries reported.
records.evidenza_testuale: At least two migrants have been injured (TBC). Initial medical examination provided by doctors in the camp (no serious injuries reported).

records.note_contesto: A migrant attempted suicide by cutting veins, sustained non-life-threatening injuries, and was hospitalized.
records.evidenza_testuale: migrant accommodated in tried to commit suicide by cutting veins. was taken to hospital but iinjuries are not life threatening.

records.note_contesto: A protest by migrants over slow asylum procedures, with no reported casualties.
records.evidenza_testuale: Arabic and Kurdish migrants (group around 40-50 persons) have started a protest... situation seems to be calm. No Frontex staff involved.

records.note_contesto: Tensions between Iraqi and Kurdish migrants resulted in two slightly injured migrants.
records.evidenza_testuale: HP handled the situation, 2 migrants were slightly injured, some items inside the containers were damaged.
